Delicious, locally sourced, organic ipsum
(only available in massive quantities)

Units are at upwards of 1000 words because this is Jason's minimum viable output quantity. If you wanted smaller amounts, this is the wrong ipsum generator for you!

The Jason Ipsum API

Jason Ipsum is also available via an API as follows 

    GET https://jason-ipsum.netlify.app/ipsum/{quantity}

Made by Phil Hawksworth. Accepting contributions to the code as PRs to increase the Lengstorfian accuracy.

For more meaningful Jason Lengstorf content visit Jason.af or learnwithjason.dev
